Finding upstream-downstream

Vignette Author

2017-07-06

library(nhdR)
## Loading required package: maps
flow      <- nhd_plus_load(1, "NHDPlusAttributes", "PlusFlow")
lines <- nhd_plus_load(1, "NHDSnapshot", "NHDFlowline", file_ext = "dbf")
vaa       <- nhd_plus_load(1, "NHDPlusAttributes", "PlusFlowlineVAA")
gridcode  <- nhd_plus_load(1, "NHDPlusCatchment", "featureidgridcode")
get_nodes <- function(flow, vaa, lines){
  flow <- flow[, c("TOCOMID", "FROMCOMID")]
  
  # find all connected nodes
  nodes <- dplyr::filter(flow, FROMCOMID != 0 & TOCOMID != 0)
  
  # remove coastline nodes
  nodes <- dplyr::filter(nodes, 
                !(FROMCOMID %in% lines[lines$FCODE == "56600", "COMID"]) & 
                !(TOCOMID %in% lines[lines$FCODE == "56600", "COMID"]))
  
  # join vaa to unique_comids
  unique_comids <- unique(unlist(nodes))
  
  
}

Developed by Joseph Stachelek.
